THE BEST WAY TO INSTALL THIS

1. Download
2. Mount ISO
3. Run setup.
4. Instead of SkidRow's crack (which didn't work for me), use the CD crack from http://m0002.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_dead_rising_2.shtml#Dead%20Rising%202%20v1.0%20[MULTI6]%20No-DVD/Fixed%20EXE which is the first link at the top.
5. Then finally place in the msvcr100.dll http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?msvcr100

Q: Do mods work?
A: Yes they do, google Dead Rising 2 PC mods.

Q: Does Co-Op/TIR work (online)?
A: No, but there is currently a person who is making a mutliplayer mod.
P.S. I am running Windows 7 64bit.
